did.unittitle: Meeting Minutes, Morgan Heirs Land Co.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises minutes of a meeting of the stockholders and a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Morgan Heirs' Land Co. in Lexington, Kentucky, on May 5, 1927; minutes of a meeting of the company's Board of Directors on January 12, 1928; and three waivers of notice of the meeting of the Big Woods Lumber Company's Board of Directors signed by M.C. Kellogg, Ed Odear, and Christine Applegate on December 5, 1927.
